Source   Edit  

Types

Event = ref object
  ## Waiters wakening can be unordered (According to asyncdispatch doc: in the order of await macro call)
  ## For ordered events, cleaner method is to use in combination with a lock
Source   Edit

Source   Edit   
proc clear(self: Event) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Clear guaranties that all waiters will be triggered, but no that have all waiters are already triggered To be sure that all waiters will be triggered, await the event yourself, and you will be the last one Source   Edit   
proc consume(self: Event) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Waiters after this call will be triggered. However it should be called immediatly without using another await (or then), or waiters will certainly will be all triggered Source   Edit
